On the day

Wedding events

February 21st, 2026 Botanic Gardens, Canberra

2.30pm Explore

Botanic Gardens, Canberra
Arrive as early as you like - the Botanic Gardens are an amazing place to explore and enjoy.

3.00pm Welcome

Botanic Gardens, Canberra

Make your way to the ceremony area, just next to the Burbridge Amphitheatre.

See the map.

3.30pm Ceremony

Botanic Gardens, Canberra

Find your seat, it's time for the big event!

Post ceremony, mingle, have a drink and enjoy the gardens.

5.00pm Reception

20 Oakes Street, Cook
Come on back to ours for drinks, food and a spot of dancing.

10.00pm Go home

Your house, hotel or camping spot
It's been a big day. Time to head home, have a well-earned rest and get ready for a weekend exploring beautiful Canberra!

RSVP

Will you be attending the wedding?

Dietary Requirements

We will be serving only vegetarian food.

Who else is coming with you?

RSVP Sent

We'll see you there!

Things to know

Food & Drink

We will be providing dinner and drinks at the reception. Drinks will also be available post-ceremony.

Dress Code

Smart casual.

Weather

Please keep in mind, this is a all-weather event. If it's forecast to rain, please bring your umbrella.

Travel

The reception (our house) is 10 mins drive from the Botanic Gardens. Please get in touch if you need assistance getting from the ceremony to the reception.

Presents

What's important, is that you share the day with us, however if you really want to give a gift, we will have a wishing well at the reception.

Mobility Assistance

It's about a 10 minute walk from the entrance to the ceremony, so buggies have been reserved for those who need it. Please let us know if you'd like one.

Here we go!

Helen and Adam
